cst8284.triviatime

Class ScoreScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.triviatime.ScoreScreen

  • public class ScoreScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    Class is used to build the final score screen with the list answers the users has gotten correct and incorrect
    Since:
    build 1.8.0_162-b12
    Author:
    kevin
    See Also:
    Pos, VBox, javafx.scene.text
